query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `stage_settings` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `stageCode` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `stageName` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `stageOrder` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `durationDays` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 3,
  `warningDays` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `escalationLevel1Days` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `escalationLevel2Days` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 3,
  `isActive` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `description` text,
  `requiredConditions` text,
  `availableActions` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

  `isActive` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `description` text,
  `requiredConditions` text,

  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
